import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import Card from "react-bootstrap/Card"; import Container from "react-bootstrap/Container"; import Row from "react-bootstrap/Row"; import Col from "react-bootstrap/Col"; import "./index.css"; import { getUserInfo } from "../../services/userService"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { getUserProfile } from "../../thunks/user"; const Profile = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const user = useSelector((state) => state.user); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getUserProfile()); }, []); let { name, birthday, gender, race, religion, address, tel_no:telNo, hp_no:hpNo, email, school_id, disability } = user.profile; return (

Profile Details

Name Name Date of Birth Date of Birth Gender Gender Race Race Religion Religion School ID School ID Class Class

Address Address Tel No Tel No Hp No Hp No Email Email Disability Disability
); }; export default Profile;
